body.name: Eicaus 12" Ring Light with Tripod Stand and Phone Holder,Selfie LED Lighting with 62" Phone and Stand,Circle Ringlight for Photography,TIK Tok and YouTube,Compatible with iPhone, Android and Cameras

features: 【Professional Ring Light Kit】The Eicaus 12" Ring Light is brighter, more professional and has more options than other 10" ring lights. The 3 color temperatures are more suitable for some specific scenes and lovers who have the ultimate pursuit of lighting, especially photographers and video creators. The upgraded light will not harm the skin and eyes, and add a three-dimensional effect to the face, with no UV rays, no ghosting, and no glare.

【USB Portable Charging】The led ring light comes with a USB charging cable, which can be powered on through power banks, AC/DC adapters, laptops, and computers, allowing you to use the ring light at home, in the office, or even outdoors.

【Various Shooting Angles】 The ball head of the tripod provides great flexibility, the ring light/mobile phone can be adjusted 180° front and back, perfect for live broadcasts, makeup, and shooting videos on Tik Tok and Youtube; especially for overhead shooting, is a boon for food photographers. With the 360° rotating phone clip, you can easily choose a horizontal mode or vertical mode.

【Extremely Lightweight & Stable Tripod】Made of premium aluminum alloy, the cellphone tripod is light, stable, and corrosion-resistant. Quickly adjust from 17 inches to 62 inches in seconds with the quick-release buckles. The standard 1/4-inch screw on the head of the tripod stand greatly improves its compatibility and can place mobile phones, cameras, ring lights, and Gopros separately.

【Durable Accessories】Equipped with a universal phone clip that is compatible with most smartphones with or without a case, it can be extended from 2.8 to 5.3 inches; a quick-connect remote control can support a distance of 10m/33ft.
【After-sale Service】Eicaus will provide you with outstanding after-sales service and a 12-month warranty (including free replacement). Any questions, please feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Upgraded and Professional 12-inch Ring Light with 62-in Tripod

3 Color Temperatures The selfie ring light can add a pop of color to your eyes, and under the soft light, it can enhance your facial features, bring you more three-dimensional sense, and better show your charm and characteristics.Color Temperture: 3000K-6000K Lamp Beads: 240pcsBrightness: 1%-100% CRI: ≥95

A must for photographers! The tripod head can be rotated 180° for overhead shooting and upward shooting.The multi-functional phone clip can be rotated 360°, easily switching between vertical and horizontal modes; there is also a cold shoe on it to place a microphone perfect for video creators.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Content Creators: 10/10 I Highly Recommend
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love this product because it is easy to use, set up, and break down. You can put it in a backpack and travel with it. Firstly, the light is perfect and has three different color options. The light will enhance your video quality tremendously. It is not heavy duty so, I would not recommend using it outdoors on a windy day but if there is no wind, you will love this product. The product is simple to use and easy to set up. BEFORE PURCHASING THIS PRODUCT: You should know that it comes with a USB plug, but it does not have a wall piece. With that being said, make sure you have an extra wall piece with a USB connection so that you can use this light without interruption. GREAT PRODUCT. I ABSOLUTELY LOVE.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great performance and quality for the price
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love it!! :)💕 you can control the brightness, tone and can start/end videos with the remote control and also take pictures. Great quality and price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Buy, Better Price
reviews.reviewText: This product is great, especially for the price. The lighting is great. It's not harsh at all , has different lighting setting and the set up is really easy. Its perfect for day and night filming. It's great for both cameras and phones. Extention cord probably needed but Definitely worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm looking forward to using this for family photos and to pack with me on hiking trips! The remote works perfectly and is so convenient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect length! The multiple colors is beautiful and it enhance my pictures and videos! I love it❤️highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got a defective product, where the light turned off and on independently. Although I procrastinated and reached out three months after the purchase, they sent me a replacement light and phone holder with no question asked. I am very happy with the outcome and the service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I originally purchased 3 of the ring lights, 2 as gifts and 1 to keep for myself. 2 of them were exactly what they were supposed to be, but the 3rd one which had been seperated from the original order that I placed at the same time as the other 2 ended up coming in not only a busted delivery box, but also a busted up product box. Once I opened it I discovered that it not only was the complete wrong size ring light but was also missing ALL of the other peices it was supposed to include. So that was dissappointing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this! When I make videos, this light helps me get the lighting just right. I love that it has multiple settings. I highly recommend this ring light!
